@ jimboJjimbo
just copy the file from the "crack" folder of the torrent to wherever you installed this file to, which should be in ur program files..
the file in the crack folder should be called "AVSVideoConverter"...
for me, my installation folder was 
C:\Program Files (x86)\AVS4YOU\AVSVideoConverter
and you should have a similar place on ur computer, so copy the file from the crack into that folder (after installing ofcourse)
